title: The Covid-19 questionnaire answered directly on the punch
content: Save time in distribution and filing by automating the mandatory Covid-19 questionnaire with Emprez and your punch.Punch is a daily passage for your employees at the beginning of their shift, why not take advantage of it to propose them to answer the questionnaire directly on it?All the answers to the questions can be downloaded in Excel format, directly from your manager access at any time.Employee visionManager viewÂ Option only available for V3 model punches,Â check your model by clicking here.ðŸ›’ Please note that this is a paid option, it will cost you $0.75/month/employee.Â To order your module, click here.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
